title: Hüseyin Yoğurtçu
text: Hüseyin Yoğurtçu (born June 30, 1983 in <a href="Bursa">Bursa</a>, <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>) is a <a href="Turkish%20people">Turkish</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player. He last played as a <a href="central%20defender">central defender</a> for <a href="%C4%B0neg%C3%B6lspor">İnegölspor</a> in the <a href="TFF%20Second%20League">TFF Second League</a>.
